mapper.select: select * from cccwww.dbo.cwbz_xiaoshou where 唯一码=#{id}
SELECT top ${pageSize} * from cwbz_xiaoshou where 唯一码 not in ( select top ${pageStart} 唯一码 from [cwbz_xiaoshou] ) and 日期 between cast('${start}' as datetime) and cast('${end}' as datetime)
select 店铺名称 as shopName,sum(销售金额) as xsje ,sum(目标金额) as mbje from cwbz_xiaoshou where 店铺名称 = #{shopName} and 日期 between cast('${start}' as datetime) and cast('${end}' as datetime) group by 店铺名称
select 店铺名称 as shopName from cwbz_xiaoshou group by 店铺名称;
select sum(销售金额) as xsje from cwbz_xiaoshou where 日期 between #{start} and #{end}
